body:
Hey Everyone! I was just thinking with a couple of friends about an idea. I know that there are official tournies that will occur weekly from now on, but I kind of wanted to kick things off with an idea for a tourney. Basically it will be a Walls Tournament. There will be 4-6 People on each team, and you will play with 3 other teams for each round. 

Right now I'm just trying to get a general interest level in this idea so that I can start the planning for it soon.

So,
Who's interested?
body_tagged:

So,
Who's interested?
title: Walls Tournament?

replies.body:
I'd say 4-5 players per team, 6 is too high and 5 is borderline 

If this actually becomes a thing, please ban certain kits (and maybe let teams do a kit veto to make it more interesting, too). 

I mean, I'd do it.

replies.body: I don't know if I would suggest a mini map or all the Tetris maps since they all have the same gameplay.  Since these games will have teams of 4 I think it could play out like the team with the last 2 or 3 teams standing advance.  I advise The Village, The Garden, and another map.  Then Springwood being the final map played.
